00027 void CBGDialog::DeInitialize() {
00028         BackgroundModel::DeInitialize();

00030

00032         m_BDmin = 0.8;

00045 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void CBGDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00047 {
00048         CPropertyPage::DoDataExchange(pDX);
00049         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_CDMAX, m_CDmax);
00050         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_BDMIN, m_BDmin);
00051         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_BDMAX, m_BDmax);
00052         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_INITFORNFRAMES, m_initNFrames);
00053         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_STALECUTOFF, m_staleCutoff);
00054         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_CLEANSTALEEVERY, m_removeStaleEveryNframes);
00055         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE, m_trackAfterAge );
00056         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE, m_trackAfterAgePercentage );
00057         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_RADIOLEARNING, m_mode);
00058         DDX_Check(pDX, IDC_ERODE, m_Erode);
00059         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_ERODESIZE, m_ErodeSize);
00060         DDX_Check(pDX, IDC_DILATE, m_Dilate);
00061         DDX_Text(pDX, IDC_DILATESIZE, m_DilateSize);
00062         
00063         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_CDmax, 0, 255);
00064         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_BDmin, 0, 0.99);
00065         DDV_MinMaxDouble(pDX, m_BDmax, 1, 9.99);
00066         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_initNFrames, 0, 100000);
00067         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_staleCutoff, 1, 100000);
00068         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_removeStaleEveryNframes, 1, 100000);
00069         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_trackAfterAge, 0, 100000 );
00070         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_trackAfterAgePercentage, 0, 100);
00071         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_ErodeSize, 1, 10);
00072         DDV_MinMaxInt(pDX, m_DilateSize, 1, 10);
00073 
00074         UpdateControls();
00075 }
00076 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void CBGDialog::UpdateControls() {
00078         switch (m_mode) {
00079                 case 0:
00080                         GetDlgItem(IDC_INITFORNFRAMES)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00081                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTLEARNING1)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00082                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN1)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00083                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN2)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00084                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN3)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00085                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00086                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00087                         break;
00088                 case 1:
00089                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN1)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00090                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN2)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00091                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTDYN3)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00092                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00093                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TRACKAFTERPERCENTAGE)->ShowWindow(SW_SHOW);
00094                         GetDlgItem(IDC_INITFORNFRAMES)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00095                         GetDlgItem(IDC_TEXTLEARNING1)->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00096         };
00097 
00098 }
